An R client for consuming APIs that follow the [jsonapi.org spec][spec].

* jsonapi home: [http://jsonapi.org/](http://jsonapi.org/)
* jsonapi spec: [http://jsonapi.org/format/](http://jsonapi.org/format/)

Nothing to see yet...
